trends: There has been one other sighting in Odense
There were no other sightings in Odense on or around October 9th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi was photographing a sun halo over denmark in odense city back in october 9th 2009 at 1.37 pm. around 1.30 pm. i looked out my window in a westerly direction, looked up to the left and saw a halo around the sun. since it was first time i had the opportunity to photograph a sun halo with my new bought camera, i hurried down to our back yard, put the camera on tripod and took 8 pictures with short intervals. i was alone and didn���������t see anything while i was photographing. i was quickly blinded by the sun and my photosession was quickly settled. a faintly luminous object, that easily could fell in with the background, had in any case been difficult to discern. it was only later when i looked through the images, that i discovered this unidentified flying object, which only appeared on one of the images. in the picture, the object appears more cylindrical than cigar-shaped, with distinct curves at each end. the rise in the middle seems to be a kind of flash of light. for me it seems to be a real physical object in 3d. basic observation data: *denmark, odense, october 9, 2009 at 1.37.12 pm *camera position: 55 24'16.82" n - 10 22'18.93" e *compass direction: south *camera: sony a100 (reflex) \ sony standard lens 3.5-5.6 \ 18-70 (on tripod) my background: i am 42 years old and live in denmark, odense. i am amateur photographer and former business manager. i encourages you to see the rest of the ufo pictures on my blog: [link moved to field investigator section\cms\tg]
Summary: I was photographing a sun halo and caught a cigar-shaped UFO
